title: Mantra Warrior: The Bridge to Lanka
overview: The war between the armies of Nram and the emperor Ravana That fought each other for a long time, endlessIn another universe, during which battle Rama was missed, was abducted by a monk, kidnapped Sita, and fled. And this is the path to help Sita's  “Age” and “Whale” Now that both of them have cracks in a small relationship... but the word “duty above life” causes them to join each other with something that comes to mind.
